alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 9:21PM EST until January 04 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches in the most persistent lake snows. The snow will across Jefferson County late this evening, mixing with rain at times near the lakeshore. Winds shifting to the northwest will then push snow bands back across the Tug Hill and into Oswego County after midnight tonight. * WHERE...The Eastern Lake Ontario Region. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact this evening`s commute and the morning commute on Thursday.
info.instruction: Lake effect snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
